description: Human activity recognition from iPhone 6s sensors. 24 subjects performing 6 activities (walking, jogging, stairs up, stairs down, sitting, standing) with smartphone in front trouser pocket. DeviceMotion data from Core Motion framework at 50Hz.

channels.name: acc_x
channels.description: User acceleration X-axis in g units (gravity removed by Core Motion)

channels.name: acc_y
channels.description: User acceleration Y-axis in g units (gravity removed by Core Motion)

channels.name: acc_z
channels.description: User acceleration Z-axis in g units (gravity removed by Core Motion)

channels.name: gyro_x
channels.description: Rotation rate X-axis from gyroscope in rad/s

channels.name: gyro_y
channels.description: Rotation rate Y-axis from gyroscope in rad/s

channels.name: gyro_z
channels.description: Rotation rate Z-axis from gyroscope in rad/s

channels.name: attitude_roll
channels.description: Device attitude roll angle in radians

channels.name: attitude_pitch
channels.description: Device attitude pitch angle in radians

channels.name: attitude_yaw
channels.description: Device attitude yaw angle in radians
